biotools.summary:
MHCII3D-Robust Structure Based Prediction of MHC II Binding Peptides.

MHC II Automated Server Benchmarks.

The knowledge of MHC II binding peptides is highly desired in immunological research, particularly in the context of cancer, autoimmune diseases, or allergies. MHCII3D is a prediction tool based on structural scaffolds of MHC II-peptide complexes and statistical scoring functions (SSFs). Its prediction performance is among machine learning tools.
